mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate= NOW(), title =#{title}, `body`= #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}, boardId = #{boardId}, hitCount = 0, goodReactionPoint = 0, badReactionPoint = 0
mapper.select: SELECT article.*, IFNULL(SUM(reactionPoint.point),0) AS extra__sumReactionPoint, IFNULL(SUM(IF(reactionPoint.point > 0,reactionPoint.point,0)),0) AS extra__goodReactionPoint, IFNULL(SUM(IF(reactionPoint.point < 0,reactionPoint.point,0)),0) AS extra__badReactionPoint, member.name AS 'name' FROM article INNER JOIN `member` ON article.memberId = member.id LEFT JOIN reactionPoint ON article.id = reactionPoint.relId AND reactionPoint.relTypeCode = 'article' WHERE article.id = #{id}
